thread.section_title: DriveTime Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of DriveTime | www.drivetime.com | 2 of 447
thread.title: Lisa

author: Lisa
title: Lisa
text: Had the car less than a year and 6 months it's been in the shop 4 times now the engine is shot and they tell me the warranty is out so they have to make a decision if they will fix it or not. Long story short I still will owe them $16,000.00 if they don't fix it or as they tell me i can let them repo and still owe (NEVER EVER GO TO THESE PEOPLE ) i'm a vet trying to take care of a family and thought this was a good place to go (NEVER EVER GO TO THESE PEOPLE)
